actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to increase the penalties imposed for certain firearms violations.

summary.text: Increases the penalty for unlawfully carrying a firearm during the commission of any felony from one to ten years to two to twenty-five years for the first conviction and from two to twenty-five years to fifteen to twenty-five years for the second conviction. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 924(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to increase the penalties imposed for certain firearms violations.
